headline: Davis Global Fund 2025 Semi-Annual Review
summary: Davis Global Fund posted a strong return of +14.12% in the first six months of 2025, outperforming its MSCI ACWI (All Country World Index) benchmark. Read more here.

headline: Oppenheimer Names AppLovin (APP) a Top Pick, Sees More Upside Ahead
summary: Applovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best growth stocks to buy according to analysts. On August 7, Oppenheimer maintained its Outperform rating on Applovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP), while also maintaining its $500 price target for the company. That represents a 15.15% implied upside from the current market price of $434.2. The firm also called Applovin a […]

headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AppLovin Corporation on Foliotrail’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APP. AppLovin Corporation’s share was trading at $437.34 as of August 7th. APP’s trailing and forward P/E were 60.07 and 72.99, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) delivered an exceptional Q2 2025, reporting […]
